search.query: `cs_cyences_index` | eval cyences_severity = case(cyences_severity=="critical", 5, cyences_severity=="high", 4, cyences_severity=="medium", 3, cyences_severity=="low", 2, cyences_severity=="info", 1) | stats count as problems, max(cyences_severity) as cyences_severity by category, alert_name | rename alert_name as savedsearch_name | append [| rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" | fields title, disabled, is_scheduled, "alert.severity" | rename title as savedsearch_name, "alert.severity" as severity] | eval cyences_severity = coalesce(cyences_severity, severity) | stats first(*) as * by savedsearch_name | search disabled=0 is_scheduled=1 | eval problems=if(isnull(problems), 0, problems) | eval cyences_severity=if(problems==0, 0, cyences_severity) | eval problem = cyences_severity."|".problems | rename problem as "Notable Events" | `cs_daily_alerts` | sort - cyences_severity | table savedsearch_name, "Notable Events"

| `cs_filter_savedsearches("O365|Email")` | append [| search `cs_o365` (sourcetype="o365:service:healthIssue" OR (sourcetype="o365:service:status" source="*CurrentStatus")) earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | eval Status = coalesce(status, Status), Service = coalesce(service, WorkloadDisplayName) | stats latest(Status) as Status latest(_time) as _time by Service host | search Status IN ("ExtendedRecovery","InformationUnavailable","Investigating*","RestoringService","ServiceDegradation","ServiceInterruption") | stats count as Count | search [| search `cs_o365` earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | head 1 | stats count | eval search=if(count>0, "", "sourcetype=DONOTRETURNANYRESULTS") | fields search | return $search] | eval Name="Currently not Operational O365 Services" | eval cyences_severity=5 | eval Count = cyences_severity."|".Count | rename Count as "Notable Events"] | sort - cyences_severity

`cs_cyences_index` alert_name IN ("*Sophos *", "*Windows Defender *", "*CrowdStrike *", "*Defender ATP*") | eval cyences_severity = case(cyences_severity=="critical", 5, cyences_severity=="high", 4, cyences_severity=="medium", 3, cyences_severity=="low", 2, cyences_severity=="info", 1) | stats count as problems, max(cyences_severity) as cyences_severity by category, alert_name | rename alert_name as savedsearch_name | append [| rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" | fields title, disabled, is_scheduled, "alert.severity" | rename title as savedsearch_name, "alert.severity" as severity | `cs_filter_savedsearches("Sophos|Windows Defender|CrowdStrike|Defender ATP")`] | eval cyences_severity = coalesce(cyences_severity, severity) | stats first(*) as * by savedsearch_name | search disabled=0 is_scheduled=1 | `cs_daily_alerts` | `cs_filter_savedsearches("Sophos|Windows Defender|CrowdStrike|Defender ATP")` | eval Count=if(isnull(problems), 0, problems) | eval Name=case(Name=="Sophos Service is not Running","Sophos Service Stopped/Disabled Events",Name=="Sophos RealTime Protection Disabled","Sophos RealTime Protection Stopped/Disabled Events",Name=="Endpoint Not Protected by Windows Defender","Windows Defender Endpoint Stopped/Disabled Events",Name=="Windows Defender RealTime Protection Disabled or Failed","Windows Defender RealTime Protection Stopped/Disabled/Failed Events",true(),Name) | append [| search `cs_sophos` type IN ("Event::Endpoint::ServiceNotRunning", "Event::Endpoint::ServiceRestored") dhost IN ("*") user IN ("*") earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | fields _time host dhost type | stats latest(type) as type by host, dhost | where type=="Event::Endpoint::ServiceNotRunning" | stats count as Count | search [| search `cs_sophos` earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | head 1 | stats count | eval search=if(count>0, "", "sourcetype=DONOTRETURNANYRESULTS") | fields search | return $search] | eval Name="Currently Disabled/Stopped Sophos Services" | eval cyences_severity = 5] | append [| search `cs_sophos` type="Event::Endpoint::Sav*" host="*" dhost IN ("*") user IN ("*") earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | fields host dhost type | stats latest(type) as type by host, dhost | where type=="Event::Endpoint::SavDisabled" | stats count as Count | search [| search `cs_sophos` earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | head 1 | stats count | eval search=if(count>0, "", "sourcetype=DONOTRETURNANYRESULTS") | fields search | return $search] | eval Name="Currently Stopped/Disabled Sophos RealTime Protection" | eval cyences_severity = 5] | append [| search ((`cs_wineventlog_system` SourceName="Microsoft-Windows-Service Control Manager" Message="The Windows Defender Antivirus Service service entered the *" Message=stopped) OR (`cs_windows_defender` EventCode IN (1150, 1151))) earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | fields EventCode, host | stats latest(EventCode) as EventCode by host | stats count(eval(EventCode!=1150 AND EventCode!=1151)) as Count | search [| search `cs_windows_defender` earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | head 1 | stats count | eval search=if(count>0, "", "sourcetype=DONOTRETURNANYRESULTS") | fields search | return $search] | eval Name="Currently Disabled/Stopped Windows Defender Services" | eval cyences_severity = 5] | append [| search `cs_windows_defender` EventCode=1151 earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | fields RTP_state host | stats latest(RTP_state) as RTP_state by host | where RTP_state=="Disabled" | stats count as Count | search [| search `cs_windows_defender` earliest=$timeRange.earliest$ latest=$timeRange.latest$ | head 1 | stats count | eval search=if(count>0, "", "sourcetype=DONOTRETURNANYRESULTS") | fields search | return $search] | eval Name="Currently Stopped/Disabled Windows Defender RealTime Protection" | eval cyences_severity = 5] | eval cyences_severity=if(Count==0, 0, cyences_severity) | sort - cyences_severity | eval problem = cyences_severity."|".Count | rename problem as "Notable Events" | table savedsearch_name, Name, "Notable Events"

condition.match: 'row.Name'=="Windows Defender - Windows Defender RealTime Protection Disabled or Failed"

search.query: `cs_cyences_index` alert_name IN `cs_monthly_alerts` | eval cyences_severity = case(cyences_severity=="critical", 5, cyences_severity=="high", 4, cyences_severity=="medium", 3, cyences_severity=="low", 2, cyences_severity=="info", 1) | stats count as problems, max(cyences_severity) as cyences_severity by category, alert_name | rename alert_name as savedsearch_name | append [| rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" | rename title as savedsearch_name, "alert.severity" as severity | fields savedsearch_name, disabled, is_scheduled, severity] | eval cyences_severity = coalesce(cyences_severity, severity) | stats first(*) as * by savedsearch_name | search savedsearch_name IN `cs_monthly_alerts` | search disabled=0 is_scheduled=1 | eval problems=if(isnull(problems), 0, problems) | eval cyences_severity=if(problems==0, 0, cyences_severity) | eval problem = cyences_severity."|".problems | sort - cyences_severity | rename savedsearch_name as Name, problem as "Notable Events" | table Name, "Notable Events"
| inputlookup cs_malicious_ip_list.csv | `cs_human_readable_time_format(last_seen)` | table ip, last_seen, ip_location, description

div.p: For more information about the Malicious IP List, please click here.
